amendment.description: Amendments en bloc comprised of amendments numbered 2, 3, 5, 12, 16, 18, 19, 20, 22, 23, 32, 33, 60, 72, 82, 86, 100, 113, and 147 printed in part A of House Report 113-460. See page D541 of the Congressional Record for May 21, 2014, for description of en bloc amendments.
amendment.purpose: Amendments en bloc No. 1 consisting of amendments numbered 2, 3, 5, 12, 16, 18, 19, 20, 22, 23, 32, 33, 60, 72, 82, 86, 100, 113, and 147 printed in part A of House Report 113-460.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McKeon amendments (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendments en bloc (A009) offered by Mr. McKeon.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the McKeon amendments (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendments en bloc (A009) offered by Mr. McKeon.
